text: aelf stands out in the blockchain landscape with its exceptional transaction speed and scalability. Its multi-dAppChain architecture enables parallel processing of transactions, significantly enhancing both speed and scalability compared to traditional single-chain systems. In terms of benchmarking, aelf consistently performs favourably against other leading blockchain platforms in transaction throughput and network efficiency. Additionally, aelf integrates artificial intelligence (AI) to optimise various aspects of its operations, including smart contract execution and network management, which further boosts its performance and scalability. This combination of multi-dAppChain architecture, advanced Layer 2 solutions, and AI integration positions aelf as a superior choice in the blockchain arena.
title: How does aelf compare to other blockchain platforms in terms of transaction speed and scalability?
